text: AWS appsync is a fully managed graphql
and Pub sub API service that helps
developers and teams build applications
Faster by making it easier to connect
applications to multiple data sources
graphql and AWS appsync improve
application development velocity by
simplifying data access through a
unified API you query only the data you
need for your application and you can
access manipulate and combine data from
multiple data sources in a single
Network request built-in security
caching and fine-grained access control
rules help you enforce data access
policies and ensure performance as a
result front-end developers always have
access to the data they need to quickly
add features to their applications
[Music]
with AWS appsync your apis are
serverless and scale automatically with
no servers to manage your costs are
lower and you can focus on your code and
not infrastructure with managed graphql
and Pub sub subscriptions AWS appsync
can push data updates over websockets to
millions of clients making appsync ideal
for real-time data use cases such as
chat Geo tracking gaming news updates
and more how are your applications with
the right data faster with AWS appsync
get started for free learn more at
aws.amazon.com appsync
